text_logic_form: Point $S$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of the trapezoid.
Point $T$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid.
The length of the line $AB$ is $3x$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $9x$ units.

diagram_logic_form: Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
Point $T$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AS$, $BD$, $BT$, $CD$, $CS$, $DT$, and $ST$ forming the trapezoid and its legs.
